Name: Spiceshroom Soup Lv.2
Description2$english: It is said that a mischievous child secretly replaced the "honey" in the honey mushroom soup with Nine-Flavor Spice, unexpectedly creating a delicious soup. Later, a chef modified it by carving the mushrooms into petals and hiding them within. Different mushrooms cause the soup to change color according to the weather.

recipes.Name: Spiceshroom Soup
recipes.Des:
Crafting yields products Lv.1, Lv.2, and Lv.3 at rates of 50%, 40%, and 10%, respectively.
Legend speaks of a mischievous child who, on a whim, replaced honey in a mushroom soup with Nine-Flavor Spice—unwittingly giving rise to a sublime new creation. The dish was later perfected by a master chef who delicately carved the fungi into hidden floral forms, causing the brew to shift its hue with the changing weather.
recipes.Des$english:
Crafting yields products Lv.1, Lv.2, and Lv.3 at rates of 50%, 40%, and 10%, respectively.
Legend speaks of a mischievous child who, on a whim, replaced honey in a mushroom soup with Nine-Flavor Spice—unwittingly giving rise to a sublime new creation. The dish was later perfected by a master chef who delicately carved the fungi into hidden floral forms, causing the brew to shift its hue with the changing weather.

NeedMaterial.Name: Granny Pine
NeedMaterial.Description: Used for cooking, making delicious dishes.

NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A rare underwater fungus regarded as a treasure beneath the sea.

NeedMaterial.Name: Limpid Azure Water
NeedMaterial.Description: Naturally harvested, it can be used in cooking or further processed for a variety of versatile applications.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Naturally harvested, it can be used in cooking or further processed for a variety of versatile applications.

NeedMaterial.Name: Nine-Flavor Spice
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: As the name suggests. Just a little bit can make ordinary food exude a charming and rich flavor. One bite, and it instantly hits your taste buds!

NeedMaterial.Name: Scallop
NeedMaterial.Description: An item found during wilderness exploration.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: An item found during wilderness exploration.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A sharp-shelled scallop that grows along the beaches of the Asteria Plains. Juicy and full of flavor.

NeedMaterial.Name: Raw Fish Meat
NeedMaterial.Description: After processing​, it can be used for delicious cooking.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: After processing​, it can be used for delicious cooking.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: The meat obtained from swimming fish, the final taste completely depends on the adventurer's cooking skills.
